DataElement.preferredName: Intervention or Procedure Occurrence Prior To Subject's Signature on Informed Consent Form Code Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A response for questions related to activities that produce an effect, or intended to alter the course of a disease in a patient encompassing the medical acts that can have preventive, therapeutic, or palliative effects that occured before the inscription provided by a human subject on the informed consent document.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Intervention or Procedure Occurrence Prior To Subject's Signature on Informed Consent Form
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An activity that produces an effect, or that is intended to alter the course of a disease in a patient or population. This is a general term that encompasses the medical, social, behavioral, and environmental acts that can have preventive, therapeutic, or palliative effects._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident._Earlier in time or order._Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement._An inscription provided by a human subject on the informed consent document.  This inscription signifies the subject's intent to participate in the clinical study, and his acknowledgement and understanding of the risks involved in such participation.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A particular course of action intended to achieve a result.

Concepts.definition: An activity that produces an effect, or that is intended to alter the course of a disease in a patient or population. This is a general term that encompasses the medical, social, behavioral, and environmental acts that can have preventive, therapeutic, or palliative effects.

Property.preferredName: Occurrence Prior To Subject's Signature on Informed Consent Form
Property.preferredDefinition: An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.:Earlier in time or order.:Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.:An inscription provided by a human subject on the informed consent document.  This inscription signifies the subject's intent to participate in the clinical study, and his acknowledgement and understanding of the risks involved in such participation.

Concepts.definition: An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.
Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.

Concepts.longName: Subject's Signature on Informed Consent Form
Concepts.definition: An inscription provided by a human subject on the informed consent document.  This inscription signifies the subject's intent to participate in the clinical study, and his acknowledgement and understanding of the risks involved in such participation.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 10/23/15: Approved and released-tt._10/21/15 edit to long name. tt_10/20/15 protocol 9878/tt.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator to represent a response of Yes, No, or Not Applicable._The affirmative response to a question or activity._The non-affirmative response to a question._Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context._A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.:The non-affirmative response to a question.:Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.:A system of numbered categories for representation of data.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
The non-affirmative response to a question.
Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created to support Theradex design of CRFs for NCI CCR trials

ReferenceDocuments.name: Did an intervention or proced
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did an intervention or procedure occur prior to patient signing consent?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient is enrolled on Phase 2 Cohort A, was last dose of erlotinib less than 28 days prior to patient signing consent?
